review.reviewtitle: Good collection, but the torrent file is messed up
review.reviewbody: I tried to originally download it via the .torrent file but for some reason it wasn't displaying the right files let alone any files.
torrent only has a few roms in it
Just use jdownloader 2. It will download all roms. Just copy the URL and it will download it all

Right click on the 'ZIP' link and copy-paste that link into Free Download Manager, XDM, uGet or another downloader helper application. Total size will be around 3.7 GB. Note that the .torrent file may *not work.
It has Almost every n64 game you need
you click on the thing that says 371 files after clicking zip and it automatically downloads the entire archive... Also greatest list ever thank you
I am so happy you shared! best set for n64!
Phenomenal list, but I wish it came with a folder of box art. I don't have wi-fi on my device, so I need a local folder with all box art for display.

The 5 roms that are included in this set are fine, but the two files it seems you need to get the rest don't ever download. The torrent stalls out at that point eventually showing an infinite download time It's not an issue on my end because I tried on 3 devices with 3 different connections.
Edit: This was in reference to the torrent. The Zip seems to be fine, of slow.
